Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.extension

Interface Summary
ICapabilityProviderService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domains/capabilityProvider extensions.
IDecoratorSemanticService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.topology/decoratorSemantic extensions.
IDomainPackagerDescriptor Provides a wrapper around <domains /> configuration elements parsed from the com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domains/packager extension point.
IDomainPackagerService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domain/packager extensions.
IResourceTypeService Service APIs to assist with accessing ResourceType information
ITopologyExporterDescriptor Descriptor for elements with the name "exporter" that are defined as part of a com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.topology extension point.
ITopologyExporterService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.topology/exporter extensions.
ITopologyPublisherDescriptor Descriptor for elements with the name "publisher" that are defined as part of a com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.topology extension point.
ITopologyPublisherService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.topology/publisher extensions.
IUnitDiscovererService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.unitLifecycle/unitDiscoverer extensions.
IUnitFilterService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.unitLifecycle/unitFilter extensions.
IUnitProviderService Provides a management layer for com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.unitLifecycle/unitProvider extensions.
 

Class Summary
ExtensionsCore  
ExtensionUtils Set of utility methods to retrive information associated with various extension points defined by the SOA Deploy platform.
